website_summaries.verdict: A convenient, quality-made box at an affordable price. The best choice for budget-minded consumers.
pros: Carbon filtration system reduces dust and odor

website_summaries.verdict: A roomy litter pan with carbon filter to control odor. Great if you have a large cat or several.
pros: Comfortable for large cats and engineered with square sides to allow for precise cleaning
Arrives with free packet of kitty litter
Cats love the privacy it offers as well
cons: Some instances of flap arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Roomier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell if my two female cats like this box or not, but I will say it's just as spacious as I'd hoped. The other photos don't really show how large this box is! It's amazing! I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LALady

customer_reviews.title: Thin Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Previously I had bought this litter box, about a year ago, and was extremely pleased, so after I recently moved I bought a new one. But this new one is not the same quality as the previous one. The plastic of the hood is still solid, but the tray where the litter (and the majority of the weight) is held, is extremely flimsy, thin and bends easily. Given how sturdy both parts of the one I had before was, this drop in quaility is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: R.Z. Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Locking lid helps to keep cats from getting the lid ...
customer_reviews.text: Locking lid helps to keep cats from getting the lid off and having litter or other things from leaking out around the sides and back. I have an exhaust fan hooked up to mine for the smells, and the flap on the door keeps cat-litter spray to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A.

customer_reviews.title: Your cat gets locked inside.
customer_reviews.text: This box is very poorly constructed. The cat can get IN to the box, but the tan plastic piece at the bottom refuses to let the solid plastic door move the opposite way once the cat is inside. This makes for a trapped cat. The "instructions" it came with was more of a sale pamphlet and was not useful at all. Not sure how thing product has such good ratings...
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: 50% Chance of Getting a Working Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these litter boxes about 6 months ago and fell in love with it. After getting another cat, I decided to buy another one. The second one was not the same as the first one litter box. The door flap gets stuck and my cats cannot get out of the litter box. It is such a disappointment after having the first one work so well. You are taking a gamble each time you buy one of these because you don't know if you will be getting one that works properly or not.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria W.

customer_reviews.title: My cat is a big cat he's not fat but ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a big cat he's not fat but he's long and has a foot long tail. I had a size large box and he is so big his head used to hang out of it while he went, now he's got plenty of room and he loves the new jumbo size
customer_reviews.author: Joseph & Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied and recommend
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is really large! In fact it is so big that I can easily keep the litter scoop inside the litter box. Great features - carbon filter, a transparent hinged cover that can be moved up and back to open up the litter box a little in case your kitty prefers easy access to litter or is not used to entering an enclosed litter box. I have a small kitten and hinged removable cover has really helped from my purchase going to waste. The lock hinges on the sides locking the top and bottom parts together might not be sturdy enough for the litter box to be carried around with heavy litter in it. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for multi-cat use
customer_reviews.text: Great box for multi-cat use. Has a great big opening so cats can get in and out easily. Also has a part on the lid that holds the bag open so that you can clean it. Biggest litter box I've come across. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chanell

customer_reviews.title: Cat and cat lady approved
customer_reviews.text: I like this box and the cats do too! It’s a nice large size and you do not need to take the whole lid off to scoop it. They are sturdy and attractive ( as a cat box can be) . I do not use the push through entry doors as my cats do not like them. I purchased 2 boxes and they are holding up great. I recommend them. I attached a photo of one of my boxes and just an FYI ...the cat shelves can be purchased on amazon also in case anyone is wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly V.

customer_reviews.title: poor design. Used a short period of time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken tabs, poor design. Used a short period of time and tabs that hold lid (and handle) broken. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It's huge, but can't find litter box liners to fit
customer_reviews.text: This huge litter box is great for our Maine Coon cat, only problem...it's nearly impossible to find a bag liner for this giant. The bags sold by Catit are outrageously overpriced and have terrible reviews (too thin, no drawstrings, etc.). I'm currently using JUMBO liners and they aren't large/deep enough...the bag stretches at the sides. Surprisingly, our cats haven't torn the liners. There is no way that I will not use bags for the litter box, that's just disgusting to me and I also like having a quick clean-up. On a positive note, the swinging door works very well and the locking tabs still work with the liner bag in place. Our cats adjusted very well to their new box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sisbarro

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Like!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a large Tupperware bin from Walmart but got tired of a wide open box. Based on reviews decided to give this a shot and I don't like it one bit. First of all, the flap for the door does not fit do we tried to file it down, still didn't fit. Decided to not use the flap at all but my next problem was littler being kicked out all over the floor even some of their poops got shot out. NASTY!! I never had that problem just using the Tupperware bin from Walmart so I'm planning on going back to that. The carbon filters do absolutely nothing to help with smell either so that's a mute point.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Firstly a clip on the side of the box is arrived broken, so the side of the litter box is sort of un stable. Second there is a glass latch, easily can get stuck. My cat actually got trapped and now is terrified of going in there ! He refuses to go in there, I cant even leave the flap lifted or open because then litter gets everywhere thus defeating the purpose of a hooded lid. Lastly, I cnt even ship this back for a return because its 17 dollars !!!! Bought this litter box for 28 dollars - shipping which is 17 leaves me with close to ten bucks. Seriously what a loss !!! Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST LITTERBOXES EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many different litter boxes but none of them were big enough or did the job. We have 3 cats and one of them is a huge male. He was continuously peeing outside of the litter boxes we had and onto wall behind the boxes. It smelled horrible and was disgusting! So we bought two of these to replace our old two and we love them! We took off the doors because the cats didn't like it. We no longer have pee going outside of the litter boxes and these boxes are huge so they are the perfect size! If u want the best litter boxes out there THESE ARE IT!!! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, helps control odor and litter tracking, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic litter box. The swinging door helps control odor, as well as litter tracking. The door is easy to flip up for daily cleaning. Every month or so, I take the whole box outside, dump it out, hose it down, and scrub it with a toilet brush. The handle is convenient, but can be difficult to use if the box is full of litter (especially clay). PRO tip: Position this box with the door facing a corner of the room to reduce litter tracking. I use the XL iPrimio trapping mat:
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves this huge, private Litter box.
customer_reviews.text: Although I gave some of the features of this litter box 4 stars, I’m giving it a 5 star review for the following reasons: • The thing is huge and my cat loves it. She has space to move around and do her business without stepping in anything. • The hanging door works awesome. No problem at all using it. • The door and the enclosed top REALLY reduce odor. I don’t know why, but Ms. Ripley (my kitty) has the most toxic odors of any cat on this planet. This box reduces that to almost nothing. I really like this box, but it does take up some space.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Door does not swing both ways trapping cat in box
customer_reviews.text: Total Junk, swinging door only swung in trapping cat in box. No matter what I did the door would not operate properly. Second unit ordered as first had missing parts which was on Amazon due to packaging, there was none no box nothing, missing door and side clips. Second one arrived in a box but door will not swing, returned for refund will look at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: right

customer_reviews.title: Door jammed, leaving cat nowhere to pee but on our couch
customer_reviews.text: Had this litter box for a about a week, door sticks once in awhile. Last night while we were asleep it got jammed in the closed position (thank goodness with the cat on the OUTSIDE), and our poor cat couldn't go in and relieve himself. All morning he kept meowing at us and finally he just peed on our couch. Not a good buy. Now we have to try and get cat pee smell out of our couch and buy a litter box, hopefully the cat's not traumatized.
customer_reviews.author: betula

customer_reviews.title: Cats love the space
customer_reviews.text: My picky cats love these litter boxes. I foster several cats, one with litter box issues, and all use these boxes without issues. I have a very fat cat who usually has to squeeze in the box, but with these litter boxes, he has room to turn around and stand up completely. Litter doesn't stick to the inside of the box, and the rounded corners make scooping much easier. I did have to take the flaps off because my cats hated them. The litter sometimes gets under the locks and makes it hard to get them all the way up or down, but that's ok. I don't really need them to lock.
customer_reviews.author: April C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really like this litter box and so does my cat. It keeps the odor contained and there are no messes outside the box. It is really big, though, so if you have a small bathroom, you may not like it. I have a small bathroom but I'm OK with the big size because my son and I are both clumsy and I'm totally paranoid that one of us will drop something into the box if it wasn't enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: World's Okayest Mom

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Solution For My Big Kitty!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large, ungraceful cat that has knocked over numerous items in the almost-two years I've had him. Did I mention he's VERY large. I was using a "traditional" sized litter box, sans the top, that just wasn't working. I came across this Catit Jumbo Hooded Litter Pan as a recommendation after I bought litter on Amazon. The price was right, the dimensions were right, and, just as described, I was extremely pleased when it arrived! My big fella navigates inside this sturdy pan without knocking off the top, the litter is contained (for the most part) inside the pan, so my clean-up time has greatly diminished. I highly this product to anyone with a larger cat!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Paws Up!!
customer_reviews.text: Because I am involved in animal rescue I have tried tons of different hooded litter boxes ( and dogs who think cat poo is a delicacy). I am hooked on this one because it's the only box that does not leak from the seams. In other words, the other boxes I have tried through the years eventually leak from my high sprayers. As you know, cat pee stinks!!! I am a crazy person for a non-smelling home. So I have just thrown out the last leaky box of belonging to another brand. I will not be buying anything but these ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Novak

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious poop pod
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace our basic cheap litter pan after getting a second kitten who likes to kick litter everywhere. It's huge! And perfect for the two of them. It makes our old box look so pathetic and I wish I got this sooner. I leave the door up because it's easier to clean and faces a wall anyway. Filled it with 20lbs and it was pretty dusty. I wouldn't put more than that in. I also purchased a large litter mat set from here for ~$10. While the floor litter problem isn't completely gone, the combo of the mat and this sh*t spaceship have definitely improved the quality of my life.
customer_reviews.author: queenfrost

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Box for Multi-Cat Use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for only two days, and I am very satisfied with every aspect of the design and functionality. I have two young kittens, and they have quickly adjusted to this product from starting out with disposable litter boxes. The filter does a good job in minimizes odor, and I expect even better performance after I re-attach the door once the kittens grow a bit. Cleaning is easy because of the opening access door on top of the box, and I am impressed that kitty waste does not stick to the sides of the box. This is a fabulous product.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Lenortavage

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box in the business!  First one lasted over NINE years!
customer_reviews.text: Our first one was purchased at the end of 2010 when we adopted our kitties. It’s been “in service” ever since! Durable is an understatement. Super easy to clean (all smooth, straight edges). We opted to replace it proactively now only because over the years the plastic had scratched and worn more and more inside from my cats “digging to china” when they bury their business. We replaced it with the exact same model. I truly can’t recommend this box enough. It’s MILES better than any of the garbage they sell in stores. And $30 for NINE YEARS of constant use amazing value. Kudos to the company!
customer_reviews.author: Candace & Jeremy Coyle

customer_reviews.title: The best litter box for large cats.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! This is a good quality plastic, extra large, covered litter box. The top fits snugly and the inside surfaces are smooth. I have flipped the door all the way open and it rests on the top rear half of the cover, giving my 18 lb tabby plenty of space. This setup does cover the handle and the filter, but that's fine with me. The curved front and back make scooping easy. I foster cats, and if I ever want another covered litter box, I will buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: CV, Henderson NV

customer_reviews.title: Nice litter box
customer_reviews.text: Nice litter box, but it came with a missing slide lock (that connects the top to the bottom)! Not sure how to contact the company to have them send me a new plastic piece. Also, the one I received is a bit different from the one shown in the pictures. The one in the pictures has a single flip-up lock to connect the top/bottom. The one I received has double slide pieces that lock...well it's supposed to at least. The one I received is missing one...you can see in my picture. I like the idea of the slide better, but it has to be included to make it work!
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend it as an item to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cat pan is not made well, plastic is very flimsy on the bottom of the opening . Received it cracked and will be returning it. I do not recommend it as an item to purchase. My previous one that I purchased several years ago was made well.
customer_reviews.author: MKH

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, but it still leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the multiple reviews that it didn't leak from cats peeing on the sides of it, and that it was roomy. It's definitely huge. We have two cats between 16-18 pounds and there is more than enough room for them to get in and do their business. However, they are still able to pee on the sides and have it leak out the sides. Also, the way the top molds into the bottom makes it a pain to clean out afterwards. So, it's back to the drawing board, and this is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and vastly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to replace the Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Pan-Warm Gray I purchased back in 2015. Although it is identified as the same model, the 2018 version I just received is a poor substitute for the 2015 product. Although the photo shows 2 clasps on each side, what I received has only one per side. The 2018 version is made of flimsy, flexible plastic-nothing like the heavy duty, sturdy litter box from 2015. This product is cheaply made and overpriced. Save your money and choose a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Graves

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this litter box, but it is not easy to clean at all. I end up just talking the whole kid off just to clean it out. Then when I take the kid off the pieces that lock it together fall off it completely. I wish it was connected in the back and you could just lift up the lid to clean it. I like that it had a filter, but my cat seems to think it is for scratching on.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: nice size for a large cat
customer_reviews.text: I have a large 16 pound cat. This is definitely an extra large litter box and, although this litter box takes up more space than a typical large litter box, it gives him plenty of room to get in the box, turn around, and do his business. Due to its size it does take quite a bit of litter to cover the bottom and be deep enough. The flap works nice and smooth. I bought additional charcoal filters for the top at the same time (the box came with one but I wanted a replacement one on-hand) and they are reasonably priced (found from another seller on amazon). I am glad I went with this box and its size.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Arrived broken/missing latches
customer_reviews.text: The latches were broken when it arrived! It came in a huge box of course but the broken latches were not in the box!! I tried to return it at Kohls but they said it was not ”returnable” (of course it was never used). I have to send it back but that actually costs more than the box. I should have listened to my husband who said just go to the store. I regret purchasing this unusable piece of crap. Regret regret regret!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Marie Chai

customer_reviews.title: Roomy litter box, easy clean feature w/flip-top lid is genius
customer_reviews.text: This litterbox has changed my life! I love the flip top for easy cleaning, the locking feature ensures that the lid doesn't slip off, the opening is high enough that minimal litter escapes, and the box is HUGE. My cat loves having all the room, and I've noticed he uses more of the box than he used his last one (he would only potty near the opening because it was too small for him). My roommate's cat completely abandoned his litter box in favor of this one as well. I would definitely recommend this litter box, and will be purchasing another in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Pan!
customer_reviews.text: What a great litter pan. My cats love it, and it's very roomy. I don't bother closing the door as I clean it one to two times a day, as needed. I guess that's for the smell. As other reviews mentioned, it doesn't work very well anyway. It catches so doesn't open up from the inside. It holds a lot of litter and gives the cat plenty of room to move around. It's big, but that's why I bought it. It's also easy to clean, no grooves to scoop around. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for large cats or multiple cats
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large cat, 15+ lbs, who was continually going outside his size cat boxes. He just couldn't move around and bury in a regular sized box. This box is big enough that he now uses it 100% of the time. The only downside is that it can be cumbersome to clean because it is so big. It also takes quite a bit of litter to fill. I still definitely recommend this box if you have a large cat or multiple cats.
customer_reviews.author: LoveUniqueItems

customer_reviews.title: The top portion came warped and doesn’t allow the door to swing freely (my cat gets stuck)
customer_reviews.text: The top portion of this litter box came deformed. The flap won’t swing freely, it’s like it was smushed or something in processing. My cat already used it, so it’d be a huge hassle for me to clean it out and return... so I guess we’re stuck with a messed up litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Abigayle

customer_reviews.title: Great, large litter box for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have two kitties who create a LOT of waste - so much that I had to scoop both my litterboxes about 7-8 times a day to make sure everything was all clean and smelling fresh. This one is spacious enough that I only have to scoop once a day, and the cats love it! There was a bit of the learning curve with the swinging door, but it was fine since you can fold it up or remove it altogether. Only thing I wish it had is a litter scoop hook, but that's easily fixable by attaching a command hook to the side of the lid yourself. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chai

customer_reviews.title: Right price, right size.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace an open style box. With 2 cats they were slinging litter all over. I like this box because of it’s size. Larger cat has plenty of room to turn around and do her business. Rectangle shape means easy cleaning and no angled or weird nooks to clean. Holds plenty of litter so be prepared to use a bit to fill. I took the door off for easier cat access. You can reach in to clean without taking it apart but that means getting on your knees. It’s easier to clean by removing the top. It has a handle but I wouldn’t lift it full of litter due to weight. All in all very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: TheOnlyMrsK

customer_reviews.title: Great clever design, very little odor, great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing bargain price, delivery included, at amazon.com. It is a really intelligent design highly functional. And now that kitty is using it regularly I noticed how little I smell any odors, compared to before ... in fact I can't detect anything except right after she does her business in there. We have to have the kitty litter box in the kitchen and now it's working out great! The only complaint it appears there were plastic flaws on the door assembly. There were two extra large bumps on each side that I had to cutaway with a knife so that the door would drop down fully. I took a photo.
customer_reviews.author: RickWAllen

customer_reviews.title: Less  Smell + Less Mess = a Win!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is fastidious in covering his messes, but he's also rather aggressive in doing so. Even a 'deep' litter box ended up with litter being kicked all over the floor. Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Pan helps keep the litter in the pan where it belongs! And the pervasive cat litter box smell is gone. I've not had to take the entire top off at all to scoop litter. The door that lifts and rest on top of the litter pan is spacious enough to allow me to scoop everything up and out. I am amazingly pleased with this litter box and only wish I had gotten it 5 years ago when I got my cat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great design but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this cat litter box. It finally solved all the litter problems for our two, 12-lb cats.The door flap prevents litter being scratched all over the floor. The charcoal filter does an amazing job of eliminating room odor. It is roomy for "the boys". It cleans up easily. However they have only been using it for a few weeks and the top edge of the bottom has developed a crack. The material is a bit too flimsy and bends very easily when I handle it to clean it out. I put Gorilla Tape over the crack in hopes of preventing the crack from expanding to fatal proportions as I love this box otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Panzer

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great big size for large cats, or multiple cat households. Secure locking system to keep top on when picking up to move. Durable. Swinging lid works great. We started our cat using it as a toy box - before adding litter, we threw a toy inside the pan with the top on, and let him figure out how to go in and come out using the flap. The toy made it very enticing for him. After 2 days of this (he really didn't need this much time, but I wanted him to be secure using it) we filled it with litter, and he's been using it ever since. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are the best value for the money, their sturdy construction makes them near impossible to break. I have used them for years without fail, I have even found if you trim the top off they make great boxes fr cats who don't like lids. The walls block side sprays and thick plastic can still support the lid. I have tried over twenty brands in my thirty eight years of owning cats, and this brand plus one other are my go too brands. Others may be cheaper but this is best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: digger

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have the space
customer_reviews.text: This is a large box. Our cat was being picky and had mostly stoped using the last box we bought her because that one was too small. My apartment really isn't big enough for such a large box but thems is the breaks with a kitty like mine. The box is easy to clean and the door is light enough for my TINY cat to move easily without being so light that it gets stuck open easily. I highly recommend this box to people with lots of space and/or jerks cats like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Shumira99

customer_reviews.title: Adjust usage to your own needs
customer_reviews.text: I removed the plexi flap as my old cat would not use the box with it in place. No big thing. I lift the front lid to clean the box easily with a scoop and add litter if I don't want to unlock the lid to do that. This was a real helpful cat litter box for my needs as my cat is large and I am old. The price was below other large boxes I priced with no real other amenities like this one offers
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaHunt

customer_reviews.title: Poor extra sort of red labeling leaving residue marking and dust catcher on box.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today. I ordered two of them. One of them came with this very large red label (4” by 8”)stuck on the litter box top. I have spent 30 minutes getting it off and trying to wipe off the glue residue. After all, there will be some litter dust that will adhere to it. It is not coming off and leaving visible places where the glue from the label was. The order # ended in 997212. How do I get this off and why was it sent to me like this? I need to put both of these boxes in place for my cats and don’t know what to do with the one with the label residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So big!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! I have two cats and they kick litter everywhere! I did not think it was going to be as big as it is but it's really perfect! It has a great feature where you can have the little door fold up and sit on top so the cats can get used to the swinging door if they haven't seen one before. Which is really nice because I didn't want to have to take the whole top piece off! There isn't litter on the floor anymore and no smell! Would highly recommend to everyone with a cat or multiple cats!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates the lid closed & popped everywhere else.
customer_reviews.text: It's very large & perfect for multicat homes. I bought it FOR the cover though, so it would help reduce the smell some, but my cat would NOT use it with the lid closed. I have the hood on it still but I have to keep the flap open or he poops everywhere but the litter box :( holds a ton of litter though so you can go 2-3 days without scooping and it's not too smelly & your cat isn't mad!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mackoul

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! The perfect litterbox!
customer_reviews.text: Huge and roomy enough for cats to go in and turn around. I wasn't sure if my cat would go in at first, so I propped the swinging door up a bit (use a yardstick or dowel) so she could go in without actually having to push through. She quickly caught on, and now doesn't hesitate when nature calls. Our litter box is placed in a closet, and it's a bit awkward to reach in for scooping, so I just take the whole top off. The top doesn't have to be locked on, unless you plan to move the whole thing. There is no more kicking litter out nor hanging the kitty-butt over the edge. 😊
customer_reviews.author: MJ in VA

customer_reviews.title: No smell!
customer_reviews.text: I am so relieved I bought this. Our cat is used to just the tray litter box and we didn’t think he’d go in a covered one. I’d had it with the litter all over the floor, so this was my solution. It’s gone above and beyond, no smell, no litter, cat (and he’s a rather long cat) has plenty of room to move around and find that perfect spot. He leaves some very smelly deposits usually and now, with the filter, it’s virtually scentless!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Check product as soon as it arrives.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to take along for my cat in case we had to leave due to a hurricane. After opening the box, the plastic bag around the product had been ripped, and I saw a scratched / cracked door and one of the locks was missing. Disappointed!! If product arrives like this, I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best litterbox!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've gotten this as my first litter box! The size is perfect for my larger cat (I have 2 cats) and I like the overall design. The locking mechanism doesnt stay fastened if I lift up on the hood but it also isnt a necessity for me. Lifting the lid to clean is a pretty neat feature but only good if you can bend low with the knees. I love it and highly recommend and would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat litter box, especially  if your dogs like to snack on cat poop
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter box is perfect for what I wanted it for. I actually use the tidy cat Breeze litter system, unfortunately, I have 3 small dogs who enjoy snacking on cat poop every chance they get, though I scoop often. I was so excited to get these, and the Breeze cat box fits perfectly inside, as if it were made for this purpose. The cats started using it immediately (I put them in one time to show them their Breeze litter box was inside) and none of the dogs have gotten cat poop! Awesome, item, solved a difficult problem, very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb, Haley & Ava's Gram

customer_reviews.title: Spacious litter box, though a little annoying to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious, my ragamuffin cat fits just fine. Overall it’s a great litter box, fits nicely in the corner. My only complaint is that the design of the litter box causes the waste to somehow keep getting stuck at the front. This makes it difficult to clean/scoop out litter. I never had this problem with other litter boxes. I’m trying to figure out if there’s a slope or angle towards the front, but it’s hard to tell. All I know is I keep having to push back litter/waste using a scooper and then scoop it out. It’s not really a dealbreaker, just a bit of a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Hina N

customer_reviews.title: Last resort
customer_reviews.text: So I have a cat that's in the 20+ lbs range and he was pooping outside of his litter box. It didn't matter how often I cleaned it he just constantly pooped outside it. I finally thought maybe he's just too big and started looking for an even larger litter box. Needless to say there has been no more poop outside the litter box. I don't want to say this litter box saved his life but it maybe, possibly, did.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya D

customer_reviews.title: Swinging Doors Are Off Kilter
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these litter boxes for years and this is the third set I’ve bought (2 each purchase). Up until now I’ve loved them. The latest ones however, when the tops are securely and properly placed on top, the clear plastic door doesn’t swing without hitting the bottom. As a result I’ve had litter outside the box and or a cat trapped inside freaking out. It seems maybe the mould is off? I’ve tried jiggling, switching tops, everything I could think of to correct the issue on both the new boxes to no avail. Anyway, I’m not happy. For the price, I expect well fitting boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Marthafaye Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box
customer_reviews.text: This covered litter box is a bit (10%) bigger than the regular ones I see at pet stores, I own one of them. This one is square--I like that shape. It is taller than other boxes I've had and seen which means that my big old fella has enough head room. (Note: for his pee, he prefers a non-covered flat shallow box).
customer_reviews.author: fruitjuicer1

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these through Amazon. 2 out of 4 of them were missing 1 locking latch and let me tell you, it doesn't matter one bit because they are much better than expected! I plan on purchasing 2 more, missing a latch or not. If you are looking for a large litter box this is it. My 5 cats range in age from 7 to 10 months old and they have no trouble going in and out through the door. The reason why I decided on this litter box is because a covered litter box with a door means less mess and less stink. I am very happy with this litter box.
customer_reviews.author: CAPT Pirate Jon Watson

customer_reviews.title: The best litter box I’ve ever bought, it is big and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great litter box. I bought 3 of them. I have two females and 1 male cat, and they have a ton of room inside. I've never smelled any urine when I'm near the box but it does get cleaned at least every other day. The doors on the boxes I had to remove because the cats hated them. There is still litter and dust but it's less than half the mess than what our litter boxes make from the cats. The top part locks easily onto the bottom. The door is large. I like the design of it a lot. Update- I bought a fourth box.. They are big and easy to control the kitty litter dust.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, comfy odor control
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is indeed humongous and it will eat a lot of litter; my two fellas hopped in as soon as it was assembled and fit with room to spare. It took them about a minute (with demonstration) to figure out the door and they've been using it happily. They still wander around and scratch the insides, but they cover their poop, which they hadn't been doing in the top-loader. Note: if you are having problems with the door not swinging, just lift it up so it sits higher on its pegs. It's always too low when you first close it after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Nice roomy litter box for cats
customer_reviews.text: I love the jumbo size of these boxes. This is the second white one I've ordered. Also love the sunroof. I remove the flap (easy to detach) giving them additional head room. This still gives adequate cover to contain the litter. The flap is nice, but my cats don't like to feel trapped inside the box. I never lock the top as it stays in place without locking. That makes it quick and easy to lift for cleaning. I have a third jumbo pan like this one except it is gray. I just recently saw this white one and really like the color better for my decor. My cats are pleased, and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Missing latch
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 11-19-19: After contacting the manufacturer (a length process navigating through their website to send it, might I add) they replied and sent a new set of latches (one for each side) to replace the one that was missing. It only took a few days to get to us, and now it is functioning properly. Great customer service, and amazing litter box! One of the latches to secure the hood onto the base was missing. We love this litter box, but are disappointed that it cannot function properly without that latch. We would be happy to just have a new one sent to us!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tested this box for 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I bought this bad boy 5 years ago. Yes, 5. What can I say, I’m a procrastinator, especially with writing reviews. In those 5 years, I will admit the door has broken off, but otherwise it’s still in great shape. The top still locks and holds strong. I can carry it full of litter without fear of anything falling apart. I think other reviews have done a great job of showing just how big it is. Rest assured, your cat will fit. What else can I say? This thing has lasted 5 years. It’ll probably last another 5. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats at our house, and playing the game of trying to keep up with two litter boxes was getting old very fast. This cat box is HUGE and absolutely perfect for our three cats. I did, however, have to opt to not attach the plastic door. My cats are apparently not very bright and absolutely could not figure out how to get out. The removable top flap is a life saver. There is nothing more annoying than having to completely detach the lid just to clean the litter box. I would 100% recommend this cat box to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Callais

customer_reviews.title: Designed by cat people, and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Thirty bucks seemed like kind of a heavy lift for something to put cat litter in, but I was swayed by some of the glowing reviews. I'm not disappointed. This thing is huge, deep, and appears to have been designed by people who actually *have* cats. The hood top folds back so scooping is almost as easy as an open pan. There is this nice thick ledge on the bottom of the entrance that defies even my furry little gold medal winner of the the Olympic Litter Toss. A handle on top flips up so moving the thing is easy. And, the curved bottom in the back makes cleaning soooo much easier. Five stars for the Catit people.
customer_reviews.author: Luise Fuzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cat Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I am writing a review on a cat litter box says a lot! Best cat litter box with a lid ever! It’s solid, not flimsy cheap plastic! And the design for easy cleaning is awesome!! No more taking off the whole lid!!! And did I mention it’s huge?! It’s large enough for my cats to have enough space height & lengthwise to so there businesses inside the cat litter box! If I ever need another one I will absolutely order this again. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cigi

customer_reviews.title: Huge Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey for a litter box, but it is SO worth it. There is no smell, even after my cat has used it. It is very easy to clean, as the top hatch connects to the door and flips up. Also, my cat figured out how the door worked fairly quickly. (Even though I'm sure she only has one brain cell. Lol!) Happy with this purchase. I also use this litter:  It's 52 pounds of quality cat litter for only ~$12. (I reccomend buying new from the Other Sellers page.)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Madelyn Teska

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but had defects...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and concept of this litter box but it had a couple issues. When the door was snapped down into position it wouldn’t swing open because it kept catching on the bottom pan. Also, out of the 4 side locks it only had 3. Because the item is out of stock and I really needed this box by Friday I’m goung to just go ahead and keep it but jimmy rig the issues it has. I would’ve preferred it to work properly and have all its parts but it well. At least the bottom isn’t cracked or something, then I don’t know what I’d do lol.
customer_reviews.author: TWest

customer_reviews.title: Very large, cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a larger than the standard cat litter box that was hooded. After reading reviews, looking at multiple styles I settled on this litter box. Very large, my cats used it right away after a little coaxing. The only issue I had was the front door would rub against the lower part of the hood and I had to trim it off so that the door swung open more freely. It left a small gap at the bottom of the door but I am fine with that and will probably glue a rubber strip on the door if odor seeps out but, I doubt I will have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Flint Jamenson

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking, well made litter box. However, if your cat is a high sprayer, it will leak where the top cover is attached to the bottom. If you want a litter box that doesn't always smell this one isn't it as it has to be cleaned constantly. Because is leaks, I have to keep something underneath it to catch the urine so it doesn't leak onto the floor/carpet. I will be replacing this box - probably with one that has a top entry.
customer_reviews.author: Outlander

customer_reviews.title: Not a treated plastic-Retains Odors
customer_reviews.text: It is not an anti-microbial treated box so regardless of how often you clean it, odors are retained and confined within that inside space. Not pleasant. The poorly designed stick on air freshener is supposed to hang inside the box off the underside of the lid. It had trouble staying on because of poor adhesive and when it did our cat batted it off into the litter. Too tempting of a play target. They could have placed a charcoal filter vent at the top and solved this issue. Lesson learned. If you and kitty prefer an enclosed box spend a few more dollars and get an anti-microbial treated surface and a vented charcoal filter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Openings let stench escape.
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 openings at the bottom of the door area that allow smells to escape and, if you have an enthusiastic digger who kicks litter a lot to cover their pee and poo, litter gets kicked out onto the floor outside the box. I’m not sure what the point of the air filter is given that air can easily escape through these holes. The cat litter box smells so much more than our old one, and the pile of litter outside the box from digging is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wessel

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: This is HUGE. I have two little boy cats and they are peeing and poopin' machines so a smaller regular box wasn't doing it. I don't leave the flap down because they don't really like it but I have no probs with odors, etc. I think that has more to do with litter options. The locks work but I find they stick at bit and one of the spots where the locks line up on the bottom snapped when I picked it up near that spot but it doesn't seem to affect it at all. Overall, I recommend this box. Just be prepared for the size!
customer_reviews.author: Monique1

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My cat and I love this litter box. We tried a couple others but this is perfect. I've had it for about 6 months now and it's held up great. The locks are super helpful. The size is great- I have a rather large fluffy cat. She doesn't like the flap on it so I just keep it up (it's folds up flat nicely). I wash it out with a mix of hot water, dish soap, and a little bleach and it cleans up nicely. Doesn't hold scents. She scratches A LOT and there's some marks in the bottom but seriously it's durable. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is HUGE! We have four cats total..two large and two normal sized. Three of them can go in there together! But honestly so much easier to clean and deal with. Two sliding latches on each side keep the top firmly clamped down. The flap on mine works fine and swings freely. I would not recommend this for a elderly person or someone with a mobility disability simply because of the weight once you fill it with litter though. Would also recommend a extra wide cleaning scooper.
customer_reviews.author: Mookie B

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I actually do like this. As other reviews indicated, quite often one of the four lid locks WERE missing, but frankly, you don't need it. It's not a cat carrier. The door is easy in-n-out for my 10.5lb cat, but, be aware they carry a bit of litter on their paws and sweeping necessary indoors daily, too. That's fine, if you keep your litter fresh. I don't get people who say it's fine to clean it every four days and this will block an ammonia smell. Great. I will never need to find that out, as clumping litter is so easy to get rid of daily. I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Pezzino

customer_reviews.title: Plastic pieces snapped off, locks on the side don't work.
customer_reviews.text: My litter box was delivered with part of the plastic piece snapped off that hooks the flap to the lid. Great. AND, the locks on the side are janky. They really serve no purpose since they aren't reliable at all. It's a big litter box, but when it arrives with plastic pieces snapped off I get a little irritated I spent $30.
customer_reviews.author: r3b0t1c4

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my cats
customer_reviews.text: My 5-month old kittens (both of them) will not use it. They won’t use it when the lid is down and they have to push it open. I’ve gotten them to use it when the lid is completely open, but that defeats the purpose of having one with a lid! I have their old small one (it’s too small for them now) that they still want to use. I’m going to buy another open air litter box, but bigger than their old one with a lip on it to see if they will use that one.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Came with one of the latches missing but we weren't going to go through the hassle of returning. Personally we don't like animal print but we liked that it is jumbo sized and is white. The door sometimes gets stuck when a cat jumps out of it so to fix that, we put some clear packing tape on the top of the door to keep it from popping up. It's great for bigger cats like our 15 pounder and perfect for cats who like to kick litter out of boxes. The door stops litter from flying everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nommysushi

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfect setup.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my older one with this. I have two medium size cats and this here is great. I always use liners think it’s disgusting of u don’t in general. Only liners that are thick and just makes it with a tad stretch but totally works is the Johnny cat jumbo liners. Love them heavy duty too unlike the cheap thin ones out there and if u don’t cut the nail forget it eventually holes. This is a great product. Love the lid opening to clean no more taking off the cover and my cats r fine with the door. Def difference on odor night n day. She’s big and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The swinging door will stop working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these. First one lasted 10 months, second 12 months and the latest only 3 months. All had the same issue. After some time the plastic around the door shifts/moves and the door will not swing one way or another. So the cat can get in or out, not both. I was happy to buy a second and then a third since I got 22 months out of the first 2, but a duration of 3 months for the third one is unacceptable. Zero support from the company, got a refund and will be switching litter box brand.
customer_reviews.author: Soggy Waffles

customer_reviews.title: I love this litter box
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box! I have two very messy boys who like the wipe their paws on anything surrounding their litter box! This caused them to get litter all over the place! I decided to get this to help with that problem and it sure did! It took a little while to get used to the door flap since they've never used one before, but they caught on pretty quickly. It also saves me from having to vacuum constantly. I definitely recommend this litter box and it's huge! They both went in there at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love it! We’ve tried several different boxes but this has been my favorite. - Compact - Great against odors - Easy-lift hood for cleaning - A bit wider than expected At first, my kitten didn’t know she could in (or out) via the plastic door. It took a bit of patience and working with her for her to get used to it. I would push her through the plastic door so that she could realize you can push in. I would also tempt her with a treat from the outside to encourage her to come out on her own. She’s, now, used to it! Overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this litter box for about 4-5 years now and really like it! My cat no longer uses the door but he used to without problem. I found the door kept getting stuck. The locks on the sides have definitely loosened and the hold isnt great any more, but its been 5 years, maybe I need a new one? Out of all the litter boxes this one looks good, easy to clean (both litter and the entire box), and cat likes it. I think the little guy feels safe in here!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cat hated it. Door sticks. Otherwise Good quality though.
customer_reviews.text: Large, well made. Door sticks - I think that’s why he didn’t like it. We kept it up, but think he was over it. Peed outside of the box for the first ever (years). Threw away the flap and eventually the lid because he just didn’t trust it after the door flap issues. Kept the base. Too bad, otherwise was sturdy and well made. Wasted money since ended up using only the base.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Roosa

customer_reviews.title: Solid box for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: (After 6 months of use) I always went with cheaper and flimsier boxes that I just recycle after they get nasty. This one is very sturdy, there is no flex to it and when the locks are engaged, I feel confident lifting it from the handle when full of of litter. I really expected a cheaper quality box for this price but I am very happy. I'll probably just pressure wash it a few times when I need to clean it, it seems like it could handle that, but if it does eventaully break I would %100 but this again.
customer_reviews.author: caferacer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box! It is so great for my 4 cats! Mama cat likes to turn around while she goes potty and the kitties can be quite messy when they are dusting off their paws and covering up their potty! This is such a nice big size! I plan to get another one in the future when I have more space! Ill use this one and a little bit smaller one for now. The cats also loved it as a play house when I was letting them adjust to it with no litter! Could have many uses for kitty cats!
customer_reviews.author: KihannaVB

customer_reviews.title: It's like a mansion for a cat litter box
customer_reviews.text: wow!! this is really big! It's like a mansion for a cat litter box! It's nice and WIDE especially for our 17lb cat , now my 2 cats have actual room to make their mess in. I removed the swinging door, for safety of the cats its not fair they would have to inhale any litter dust or if they might of got stuck in there, so I would advise anyone to remove it...
customer_reviews.author: Membros the Invader

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this box - cheap item!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this litter box when I ordered it but now I'm very disappointed. It arrived missing a piece (see photos - one of the four lock mechanisms). Also, the door gets stuck easily. Overall, it's fairly cheap and unable to support the weight of the litter -- the top will frequently pop off despite being in the lock position. I'm constantly having to re-attach the top. Do not purchase this box.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hoey

customer_reviews.title: Easy scoop and clean, roomy, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty good litter box. My cats appreciate the extra space. It is very easy to scoop and clean. Looks nice. The hood and door do a great job of eliminating odors. My only complaint is that the doors don’t quite fit right so they can stick sometimes. The cats don’t like it when the door sticks so they end up going on the floor in front of the box. It’s a pretty easy fix with a utility knife to remove a little material and get the door swinging freely. For the price, this is the best litter box I’ve used yet!
customer_reviews.author: Twanner

customer_reviews.title: My favorite litter box!
customer_reviews.text: I've had cats my whole life and thus many opportunities to try different boxes. This is the best I've bought. It is big enough that my giant 20lb cat doesn't go outside the door, it's made of heavy-duty plastic, the locks stay locked, there are no nooks for liquids to get in and get gross. I've tried the XL covered pans from big box stores, they don't hold a candle to this one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, but I am not liking it... The lid is extremely difficult to secure, and then very difficult to remove. The door doesn't hang quite right so it gets stuck. I am afraid my cat will get stuck inside it so I have to leave the door up, which defeats the purpose of having this type of litter box. It is large. But that is really all it has going for it.... Honestly I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H.

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box for large cats!
customer_reviews.text: Love how big this box is the tiger stripes are cute my cats love these boxes I have two. I rated four stars for easy-to-clean would have given five stars if it opened back farther and I also have to remove the swinging door because The cats won't use it. Highly recommend this litter box for big large cats!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect with the quality of the plastic...we were pleasantly surprised! We have 2 cats and it is just right for them, nice and roomy. It is easy to clean...no edges to scrape! The door...one cat was ok...the other not so much. So we have had to keep the door open. We did notice that when it was closed it did keep the odor way down. Now...we just have to get our other cat to get used to the door! We would recommend this product. NOTE: Do NOT try and pick this up by the handle when full of litter...it is not made to be carried in that fashion.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: My cat has his own “room”
customer_reviews.text: I travel often with my cat and stay with friends When space is tight, tho large, it can be tucked in a room and totally enclosed Out If sight, sound, smell and scattering litter I removed the door My cat likes to keep an eye on things on the outside
customer_reviews.author: Oakley Kinlok

customer_reviews.title: The entry door does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this litter tray because my cat had developed a strategy of getting into her litter tray and then urinating over the side onto the floor. Since the door is open she was able to urinate onto the floor, which is what I am trying to eliminate. The door seems to be larger than the opening, or the opening is distorted. Any way, I think that she might not be able to get into this box if the door was closed. So, for now it is open. I'll work on a way to get it to close and to operate correctly. I rated it a three star because the door working is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Master

customer_reviews.title: BEST litter box out there, period. Fits JUMBO standard size bags.
customer_reviews.text: We could not find a box that was as good as this one, and that fit jumbo standard bags. This one does. You can dissasemble it completely and clean it with water and soap. The removable door makes it very easy to keep it clean between full litter changes (we scoop a couple of times a week, and after 2 weeks , change the sand completely). We use clay litter and it combines really well with this box. I would definitely buy another one if necessary, but it has not broken so far. We own 2 medium size cats and they got used to it real quick.
customer_reviews.author: Rummy

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for this cat box
customer_reviews.text: I had two cats with two normal boxes. When my sister dumped a third cat on me; we had some issues. Even with three litter boxes, it was litter armageddon. Didn't matter how often I cleaned the boxes, it was a mess (I won't go into gross details). Even though I have three small girls, I got two of the jumbo covered boxes. PROBLEM solved! Even if you have a big tom, these boxes work perfectly. Easy to pick, plenty of room, and if they kick around it stays in the box.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box for Maine Coons!
customer_reviews.text: I have Maine Coons so needed jumbo litter boxes. My pride loves these boxes. If the feel a little too enclosed they just pop the lid up themselves and are happy campers especially my big big boy who could used an extra jumbo cause he’s so tall lol. These are perfect litter boxes and I’ll never buy another one other than this one should I have the need. Easy to clean and all five of my Pride love them! You can’t go wrong with this litter box especially if you live with big Maine Coons like I do!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

product_meta.title: Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Pan
product_meta.description: Color:Warm Gray| Style:Litter PanThe Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Pan provides privacy while retaining the litter inside the pan. The large hood lifts up for easy access for cleaning, while the built-in bag anchor helps keep the bag open and frees hands for scooping. The carbon-impregnated filter effectively traps and removes litter box odors. The door opening measures 10. 4 inches by 9. 6 inches. The Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Pan is ideal for multi-cat households. Replacement carbon filters sold separately.
feature_bullets: Provides your cat with privacy while retaining their litter inside the pan
Large hood lifts up for easy access for cleaning
Carbon filter works to remove odors. Made of BPA-free materials
The large hood lifts up for easy access for cleaning, while the built-in bag anchor helps keep the bag open and frees hands for scooping
The carbon-impregnated filter effectively traps and removes litter box odors.
Door opening measures 10.4 inches by 9.6 inches. Dimension when assembled is 22.4"L x 18.3"H x 17"W. Hand wash with mild soap and water

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
